description: Leading with visual portfolio of finished architectural models. Emphasis on SLA resin detail quality and professional finishing. Free sample offer as CTA.
ROI-focused pitch comparing 3D printing costs and timeline to traditional model shops. Emphasizes consistency, scalability, and Net 30 terms for larger firms.
Showcasing detailed interior model prints with furniture and fixture details. Emphasis on color printing options and miniature accuracy.
key_elements: Furniture and fixture detail at small scale

description: Triggered by detection of an active design competition. Offers to print the competition model with rush turnaround. High urgency = high conversion.
Pitch to real estate developers focused on stakeholder presentations and investor meetings. Physical models help close funding rounds and zoning approvals.
